name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sonic’s Star Power: A Hero’s Glow Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feel Sonic’s star power and heroic glow in this vibrant live wallpaper, featuring dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Sonic radiating energy and speed with a glowing starry backdrop.
Minimalist Design: Clean and modern interface for seamless browsing.
Clock and Date: Stay organized with a visible time and date display.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Fast navigation to your favorite websites.
Google Search Bar: Convenient and efficient search functionality.
More Extension: Expand your browsing experience with additional features.
